From: 
To:' 
Subject: RE: Please read - child exploitation/sex crimes case updates 
Date: Wed, 12 Feb 2020 20:30:34 +0000 
Ha no worries at all!! 
From: 
Sent: Wednesday, February 12, 2020 15:08 
To: 
Subject: RE: Please read - child exploitation/sex crimes case updates 
Thanks. I did do a quick scan for the obvious ones but I guess I missed this one. O 
From: 
Sent: Wednesday, February 12, 2020 2:39 PM 
To: 
Subject: RE: Please read - child exploitation/sex crimes case updates 
Epstein case is charged and . . . nolle submitted post-death. 
From: 
Sent: Wednesday, February 12, 2020 14:30 
To: 
Subject: Please read - child exploitation/sex crimes case updates 
It's that time again... 
EFTA00030788

If you are in the "to" line of this email, you have a Project Safe Childhood case for which we need an update. Because of 
the sensitive nature of these cases, it's critical that we don't let cases linger, and, in consultation with your supervisors, we 
close cases when necessary. 
Please review the attached list, noting the most recent entry for any case under your name. Then... 
• If the case is uncharged, please advise me of the status of any expected charges and/or come by to discuss next 
steps. 
• If the case has been charged, please send me a quick email with any updates to the case status (e.g., pled, 
sentenced, on appeal) or, if the status is up to date, please confirm that no changes need to be made. 
Thanks in advance for your prompt reply to this email. (Read: Please don't make me hunt you down for updates —  this will 
take approximately 5 minutes.) 
Thanks, 
EFTA00030789
